description:
There`s a stamp boom in the Kamohara family. If someone does a good thing for Mom, they get a stamp, and if you receive thirty of them, Mom will get you anything. The sentimental spirit appears in front of Mom after a long absence, but he`s got a lot more grey hairs and he`s clearly depressed. A day when Dad and Fumi are looking after the house. Dad doesn`t realize that Fumi is a bit lonely on the inside.The Kamohara family pets are Jon the dog and Kiku and Tora, the cats.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Stamp / Story of a Spirit / Father and Daughter / Similar Couple
スタンプ / 精霊のひとりごと / 父と娘 / 似たもの夫婦
